alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 30 at 10:05AM PST until January 31 at 5:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County and Central and Eastern Lake County, mainly over the higher terrain, but also along Highway 31 near Summer Lake. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult for high profile vehicles. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
